description:

“Are you tight?” he replied.  William was smiling, looking at the ground.
“So, are you tight?” I asked William.
“Yeah,” he said, and then laughed nervously.
That’s all Ford needed to hear.  After a gentle prodding, the two of them had their tongues down each other’s throats.
Ford has come a long away in a short period of time.  For a guy who was nervous about showing off his man hole, he’s become quite the versatile fucker…
title: William & Ford
